mapper.select: select ORDER_NUMBER, USER_ID, BOOK_NUMBER, ORDER_PASSWORD, ORDER_ORDERER, ORDER_RECIPIENT,TO_CHAR(ORDER_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS ORDER_DATE, ORDER_PAYMENTDATE, ORDER_RECEIPTADDRESS, ORDER_REQUIREMENT, ORDER_STATUS, ORDER_WAY, ORDER_QUANTITY, ORDER_ORDERNUMBER from tbl_order

select sum(order_orderprice)as gross,to_char(order_date,'yyyy')as orderyear from tbl_order where to_char(order_date,'yyyy') > to_char(sysdate,'yyyy')-4 and order_status='입금완료' group by to_char(order_date,'yyyy')
